content: To obtain the Buddha's Left Hand, you need to defeat Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw in the Lower Hollow in The Webbed Hollow.

The content is as follows:
To obtain the Buddha's Left Hand, you need to defeat Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw in the Lower Hollow in The Webbed Hollow.
